Title: Nigeria’s bronze artists cling to centuries-old techniques
Summary: Artists in Benin City still mould molten metal by hand, preserving centuries-old techniques . Using long iron tongs, they mould the bronze by hand . The Benin Empire mastered bronze casting, as Nigeria fights to reclaim its stolen bronze .

Title: ETO boosts agri-exports, to hit five more states next year
Summary: The ETO platform of the Truck Transit Parks Limited (TTP) has supported the growth of the export of agricultural produce by over 464 per cent between 2021 till date, the company has said .

Title: Lafarge Africa deepens commitment to community development

Title: Jumia’s data shows Nigerians turning to digital retail to navigate inflation pressures
Summary: As Black Friday 2025 unfolds across Nigeria, new insights from Jumia’s Q3 2025 financial results reveal that more Nigerians are relying on digital retail to navigate inflation and rising living costs .

Title: Accord resets Osun structures amid speculation over Adeleke’s 2026 bid
Summary: Accord resets Osun structures amid speculation over Adeleke's 2026 bid . Mgbudem declared that the party had entered a new phase of consolidation and unity nationwide .

Title: South Africa hostel shooting leaves 11 dead – Police
Summary: The attack is the latest in a string of mass shootings that have shocked the crime‑weary country of 63 million people . South Africa suffers one of the highest murder rates in the world .

Title: ZUFF Awards: Nigerian-American Amkpe bags best director, Sam Dede Best Supporting Actor
Summary: Nigerian-American Amkpe bags best director, Sam Dede Best Supporting Actor . The ZUFF 2025 jury made the announcement on Friday night at the grande finale of the prestigious Zuma awards ceremony .

Title: There’s proof menopause makes you more forgetful!
Summary: Separate research on 16,000 women, also undertaken in America, showed that four in 10 admitted having memory problems . Four in 10 women in the U.S. admitted to having problems with memory .

Title: Nigeria pushes continental efforts to reduce cancer deaths
Summary: Federal Government has called for stronger Pan-African collaboration to tackle the continent’s growing cancer burden . Cancer now kills more Africans annually than HIV/AIDS, malaria, and tuberculosis combined . Title: Benue APC hails NWC, Alia on digital registration
Summary: Chairman of the All Progressives Congress in Benue State, Benjamin Omale, has lauded the National Working Committee of the ruling party over the transition of members’ registration to digital . Omale described the digital membership drive as central to the party’s strategy for victory in the 2027 general elections . The ruling party in the

Title: Police avert cult clash, arrest two suspects in Anambra
Summary: The Anambra State Police Command arrested two suspected cultists in Enugwu Ukwu, Njikoka Local Government Area . The suspects were arrested on Thursday by police operatives attached to the Special Anti Cult Squad . A locally-made double-barrel shotgun and two live cartridges were recovered from the suspects .

Title: Oyo APC backs Tinubu for 2027 presidency
Summary: The All Progressives Congress in Oyo State has unanimously backed President Bola Tinubu for a second term in office in 2027 . The endorsement was announced on Friday at the Oyo APC Stakeholders’ Summit held at the party’s Secretariat, Oke-Ado, Ibadan .
